column5: looking for a guide on lac seul would like the west side thanks , Rick
generally the lodge owner where you stay can put you in touch with a guide that is familiar with their section of the lake.
I know a great guide for you. I'll let him know and he can post a response right here.
Contact Evergreen Lodge in Ear Falls. Gary guides quite a bit.
Owner of Golden Eagle Resort, Scott, guides some. They are very close to Ear Falls.

Best Pike Guide on the lake is J.R. Derksen...The sad news is that J.R. is only on the lake one week a year and he is fully booked. If one would contact him and twist his tail a little he might help you [email protected]
I don't think I would hire a guide for a lake that size that only spends one week on it?
You really don't need a guide unless you have never fished before. This is the best lake/river/flowage I have ever fished. And we went up in late July. Merry Xmas,2Fishy
